ui.title: UI Guide
ui.subtitle: Get familiar with the DeepTrans Studio interface and learn how to use each functional area

introduction.title: Interface Overview
introduction.description: DeepTrans Studio provides an intuitive and efficient translation workspace, mainly including core functional areas such as translation IDE, project management, terminology and translation memory management.

sections.name: Translation IDE
sections.description: Professional translation workbench with paragraph alignment, version tracking, keyboard shortcuts, and multi-agent collaboration

features.title: Explorer
features.description: Located on the left side of the interface, used to browse and manage documents and segments in projects. Supports expand/collapse folders, quick document item location, and translation status viewing.

features.title: Parallel Editor
features.description: The main editing area in the center of the interface, displaying source and target text side by side. Supports rich text editing, terminology highlighting, real-time saving, version comparison, and more.

features.title: Translation Workflow Panel
features.description: The bottom panel displays the complete translation workflow, including pre-translation process, MT review, quality assurance process, QA review, post-editing process, post-editing review, sign-off, and output logs.

features.title: Right Side Panel
features.description: Contains AI chat assistant, document preview, help panel, and other functions that can be toggled as needed.

features.title: Top Menu Bar
features.description: Provides quick access to translation, quality assurance, post-editing, export, search, view settings, and other operations.

sections.name: Project Management
sections.description: Full lifecycle project management, including creation, initialization, and document processing

features.title: Project List
features.description: View all projects in the Dashboard, supporting functions such as creating new projects, filtering, and searching.

features.title: Project Initialization
features.description: Initialization process after creating a new project, including document parsing, segmentation, terminology extraction, etc., guided through visual steps.

features.title: Document Preview
features.description: Supports previewing original documents and translated documents for comparison and checking.

sections.name: Terminology Management
sections.description: Professional domain dictionary management, supporting project/personal dictionaries and terminology import/export

features.title: Dictionary List
features.description: Manage public dictionaries, project dictionaries, and personal dictionaries, supporting create, edit, and delete operations.

features.title: Term Entry Management
features.description: Add, edit, and delete term entries in dictionaries, supporting batch import (CSV, Excel, and other formats).

features.title: Term Application
features.description: Automatically identify and apply terms during translation, supporting term highlighting and quick replacement.

sections.name: Translation Memory
sections.description: Translation memory import/export, Milvus vector retrieval, and visualization

features.title: Memory Management
features.description: Create and manage translation memories, supporting import/export in TMX, CSV, and other formats.

features.title: Hybrid Search
features.description: Perform memory retrieval during translation, supporting hybrid search mode combining vector retrieval and keyword matching.

features.title: Search Results
features.description: Display matching translation memories, including similarity scores, source-target text pairs, supporting quick application.

sections.name: AI Assistance
sections.description: Built-in translation, terminology extraction, grammar/discourse evaluation, word count statistics, and multi-engine comparison

features.title: AI Chat Assistant
features.description: AI assistant in the right panel for translation consultation, terminology queries, translation suggestions, and other interactions.

features.title: Smart Translation
features.description: Supports multiple translation engines (OpenAI, DeepSeek, etc.), enabling batch pre-translation and real-time translation.

features.title: Quality Assessment
features.description: Automatically perform grammar checks, discourse evaluation, terminology consistency checks, and other quality assurance operations.

features.title: Terminology Extraction
features.description: Automatically extract terms from documents, generate term candidate lists, supporting batch addition to dictionaries.

sections.name: Workflow Automation
sections.description: Automated task processing for batch translation, evaluation, document parsing, etc.

features.title: Batch Pre-translation
features.description: Batch pre-translate multiple selected document items, supporting progress tracking and result persistence.

features.title: Batch Quality Assurance
features.description: Batch execute quality assessment tasks, checking translation quality, terminology consistency, and other issues.

features.title: Task Queue
features.description: Manage background tasks through BullMQ queues, supporting task status queries and cancellation operations.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Keyboard shortcuts to improve work efficiency

tips.title: Usage Tips
items: Use Explorer to quickly locate documents: Expand folders in the left Explorer, click document items to open them in the editor.
Leverage terminology highlighting: Terms added to dictionaries are automatically highlighted in the editor for easy identification and application.
View translation history: Check the processing history and results of each stage in the translation workflow panel.
Use AI assistant: Open the AI chat assistant in the right panel to get translation suggestions, terminology explanations, and other help.
Batch operations: After selecting multiple document items, perform batch translation, quality assurance, and other operations through the menu bar.
Customize layout: Adjust panel sizes by dragging to fit personal work habits.
